content: I think I'll place the lamp on a side table or a desk near my reading nook, and surround it with some of my favorite books and maybe a few decorative objects that have an industrial vibe. I've also been thinking about adding a few more industrial elements, like a metal wall art piece or a reclaimed wood shelf, to create a cohesive look. Do you have any advice on how to choose the right metal wall art for my room?
